warnings: Warnings For external use only Do not use on broken or damaged skin When using this product kep out of eyes. Rinse with water to remove Stop use and ask a doctor if irritation or rash occurs Keep out of reach of children. If product is swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away
dosage_administration: Directions Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure Use a water-resistant sunscreen if swimming or sweating Reapply at least every 2 hours Children under 6 months: ask a doctor
